name: Pie-man
body:
.Run bootdb.rb once to set up the initial database.
> ruby bootdb.rb

.Change settings in meta/config.yml as required.

.Run pie-man.rb to start your bot.
> ruby pie-man.rb
.To stop loading certain plugins with the bot
.specify in meta/config.yml

.To add new features to bot, put your class inside the plugins/ directory
.make use of the format:
> module PieMan
> class NewFeature
> end
> end
.for better separability.
.Add a regex and other logic to support the new command inside filters.rb
.and finally load the module inside pie-man.rb
tagline: an IRC bot that does no wrong
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
